# Project Setup Complete ✅

## React Native Posts Assessment App

All steps have been completed successfully. This is a production-ready React Native application with modern UI/UX design.

### Project Details
- **React Native Version**: 0.73.0
- **Expo Version**: 50.0.0
- **TypeScript**: Yes (for type safety)
- **Architecture**: Clean folder structure with separated concerns

### Features Implemented
1. ✅ Posts API integration (JSONPlaceholder)
2. ✅ Real-time search functionality
3. ✅ AsyncStorage for search persistence
4. ✅ Error handling with user feedback
5. ✅ Pull-to-refresh
6. ✅ Skeleton loading animations
7. ✅ Modern Gen Z UI design
8. ✅ Smooth animations and transitions

### Components Built
- PostCard - Individual post display with animations
- SearchInput - Animated search bar
- Header - Gradient header
- EmptyState - Empty/error states
- ErrorBanner - Auto-dismissing notifications
- LoadingSkeletons - Shimmer loaders

### Services Created
- postService - API and filtering logic
- storageService - AsyncStorage management

### Custom Hooks
- useFetchPosts - Fetch posts with error handling

### Additional Libraries
- @react-native-async-storage/async-storage (search persistence)
- expo-linear-gradient (gradient backgrounds)
- Material Community Icons (UI icons)

### Ready for Submission ✨

The project is complete and ready to submit. See SUBMISSION_GUIDE.md for submission instructions.
